title: Successful User Login
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid username and password, receiving a JWT token and HTTP-only cookie.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username and password
Click login button
Check that response status is 200 and JWT token is set in HTTP-only cookie
Verify user information is returned in response

title: Login Failure with Missing Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with a 400 response if username or password is missing.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Submit login with missing username or password
Check that response status is 400 with appropriate error message

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with a 401 response when username or password is invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username or password
Click login button
Check that response status is 401 with invalid credentials message

title: Create New Booking Successfully
description: Verify that a customer can create a new booking with valid field, date, multiple time slots, and customer details and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to booking page
Select sport category
Select specific field by field code
Pick a valid booking date with available slots
Select one or more available time slots
Enter customer name, phone, and email
Submit booking request
Verify that booking is created with 201 status
Confirm booking details are correct and booking summary is returned

title: Booking Creation Prevents Double Booking
description: Verify that booking creation fails with a 409 response if selected time slots are already booked preventing double-booking.

steps.description: Attempt to create a booking with time slots already booked for selected field and date
Submit booking request
Check response status is 409 indicating time slot conflict
Verify error message indicates time slot conflict

title: Fetch Bookings Filtering by Field, Date, and Status
description: Validate that bookings API returns correct results when filtered by field ID, date, and status.

steps.description: Send GET request to bookings API with fieldId filter
Verify returned bookings belong to specified field
Send GET request with date filter
Verify returned bookings match specified date
Send GET request with status filter (e.g. confirmed, pending)
Verify bookings have the requested status

title: Create New Sport Category Successfully
description: Verify that admin can create a sport category with required fields sport_name and sport_type and optional description and availability.

steps.description: Send POST request to sports API with valid sport_name and sport_type
Include optional description and is_available flag
Check response status is 201 and sport category is created

title: Get All Available Sports
description: Verify that GET /api/sports returns a list of sports with optional show_all query to filter availability.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/sports without query
Verify list of all sports is returned
Send GET with show_all=false to fetch only available sports
Verify returned sports have is_available = true

title: Create, Update, Delete Sports Field with Image Upload
description: Verify CRUD operations on fields API including field creation with required fields, updating details including image URLs, and deleting fields.

steps.description: Send POST request to fields API with required field_name, field_code, sport_id, price_per_hour
Include optional description, url_image, and is_available
Check response status 201 and field created
Send GET request to fields API with filter isAvailable=true
Verify returned fields have is_available true
Send PUT request to update field information including new image URL
Verify field data is updated successfully
Send DELETE request to remove a field
Verify field is deleted and no longer returned on GET

title: Role-based Access Control on Administrative Endpoints
description: Ensure that sports category, fields management, and booking approval actions require authentication and correct role permissions.

steps.description: Attempt to create sports category without authentication
Verify access is denied (401 or 403)
Login as non-admin user and attempt to manage fields or approve bookings
Verify access is denied due to insufficient permissions
Login as admin and perform CRUD operations
Verify operations succeed

title: Cashier POS Payment Processing Validations
description: Verify cashier point-of-sale accepts payments for bookings and F&B items, validates cash input, calculates change accurately, and generates invoice.

steps.description: Add booking and food & beverage items to multi-tab cart
Enter cash amount less than total price
Verify validation error is shown for insufficient cash
Enter cash amount equal to total price
Verify payment accepted with zero change
Enter cash amount greater than total price
Verify change is correctly calculated and displayed
Complete payment
Verify booking status updated and invoice is generated

title: Revenue and Booking Analytics Visualization Accuracy
description: Verify that the admin dashboard shows accurate revenue overview, booking trends, and allows filtering by date range and sport category.

steps.description: Access admin dashboard revenue and booking trends charts
Verify data matches database revenue and booking records
Apply time period filters (e.g., last month, last year)
Verify charts update accordingly with filtered data
Filter by sport type
Verify displayed data corresponds to selected sport only

title: AI Assistant Booking Query Handling
description: Verify that the AI assistant chatbot correctly understands and responds to booking-related queries and general venue information.

steps.description: Open AI assistant chat interface
Ask about booking a specific sport or field
Verify assistant provides correct booking instructions or availability
Inquire about general venue information (e.g., location, operating hours)
Verify AI provides accurate information from venue data

title: Booking Multi-slot Time Selection Edge Cases
description: Verify system behavior when selecting multiple contiguous and non-contiguous time slots for booking.

steps.description: Select multiple contiguous available time slots for a booking
Submit booking
Verify booking is successful and time slots reserved accordingly
Select multiple non-contiguous time slots (e.g., 9-10am and 12-1pm)
Submit booking
Verify booking creation either allowed or appropriately validated (depending on business rule)

title: Booking with Invalid or Past Dates
description: Verify booking creation fails or is restricted when a past date or invalid date format is submitted.

steps.description: Attempt to create booking with a date before current date
Verify booking request is rejected with validation error
Attempt to create booking with invalid date format
Verify API returns 400 error with descriptive message

title: Customer Info Validation on Booking Submission
description: Verify validation rules for booking customer info fields: name, phone, and email.

steps.description: Submit booking with missing customer name
Verify request is rejected for missing required fields
Submit booking with invalid phone number format
Verify validation error returned
Submit booking with invalid email format
Verify validation error returned

title: Sports and Fields Listing with Image and Pricing Display
description: Verify that the customer-facing landing and booking pages correctly display sports categories, venue fields with images, pricing, and availability status.

steps.description: Open landing page and booking interface
Verify sport categories are listed with correct names and descriptions
Verify fields show images and price per hour
Verify fields marked unavailable are not selectable

title: Session and JWT Token Security
description: Verify that authentication tokens are issued securely via HTTP-only cookies and that protected routes validate JWT for session management.

steps.description: Login and inspect cookies set by server
Verify JWT token is stored in HTTP-only cookie
Access a protected admin endpoint without authentication
Verify access is denied
Access admin endpoint with valid JWT cookie
Verify access granted
